title: Games industry M & A transactions cumulative value worldwide 2010 to 2016
summary: In general Value in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Value in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, and finally roughly constant from 2011 to 2014.
The line rapidly increased by 1657.41% from Year 2010 to 2011,increased by 547.34% from Year 2012 to 2013, and lastly, remained stable by 73.17% from Year 2013 to 2014.
Maximum Value in million U.S. dollars, about 7757.4 was reported at Year 2014
Minimum Value in million U.S. dollars about 81.0 was reached at Year 2010
